thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Jennifer Rapovich
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Jennifer Rapovich

author: Jennifer Rapovich
title: Jennifer Rapovich
text: I have been a customer of FramesDirect.com for many years. Ordering online for eyewear from this company has been great. Prescription lenses have been accurate and I have never had a problem with the frame ordering, either. Alan E in particular has been so helpful in getting my last order placed and seeing it thru to the end. I would highly recommend them to anyone.
